title: National Beauty - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Brotherhood   Clever Protagonist   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Imperial Harem   Marriage   Nobles   Politics   Royalty   Seduction   Slow Romance
author: Laughing Beauty   笑佳人
description:
Song Jianing was charming and beautiful.
 
She accompanied her mother on her remarriage to the House of Guo Gong. 

Though she tried to be dignified, she was still targeted by her domineering stepbrother. 

Her heart trembling, Song Jianing secretly stuffed Zhao Heng with a piece of candy: I’ve been good to you, so you have to support me in the future. 

Zhao Heng then supported her all the way, sharing the glory and beauty of the country.>
